text: Claire K. Shulman (February 23, 1926 in Brooklyn, New York - August 16, 2020 in Queens, New York) was an American politician. She was the borough president of Queens, New York City from 1986 until 2002. She was the first woman to hold this position in Queens history. Shulman died on August 16, 2020 of lung cancer at the age of 94.Claire Shulman, Former Queens Borough President, Dies at 94 ==References== ==Other websites== *City Hall News (03/12/2007) *New York Times 1996 article Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Queens borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Claire Shulman
